info.name: 4chan Yotsuba Green 2.0
info.description:
Based on BlauBernd's style, but modernized.

Thanks BlauBernd for creating this style in the first place.
Special thanks to the anons on /g/ for helping me out.

NB: you might need to add the homepage to your adblock whitelist otherwise it might be displayed incorrectly. I don't know why this is, if you know why let me know so I can update this style.
info.additionalInfo: Changelog v 1.1.0 - Jun 17, 2017 - html color now correct on boards.4chan.org and 4chan.org v 1.0.3 - Jun 12, 2017 - More ads removed; minor tweaks at the bottom of pages v 1.0.2 - Aug 27, 2016 - Minor edit to html color v 1.0.1 - Jan 25, 2016 - Disclaimer text at the bottom of a thread is now dark green v 1.0.0 - Jan 23, 2016 - Style uploaded
